meanings.definition: The quality of being manageable or easy to control or handle.
meanings.sent1: The manageability of the new software made it simple for everyone to use.
meanings.sent2: The manageability of the project allowed it to be completed on time.
meanings.sent3: The manageability of the puppy made training a breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor added to the manageability of the chaotic situation.
meanings.sent5: The manageability of the puzzle made it enjoyable to solve.

meanings.definition: The ability to be managed or controlled effectively.
meanings.sent1: The manageability of the team ensured smooth operations.
meanings.sent2: The manageability of the budget helped in financial planning.
meanings.sent3: The manageability of the garden made it a relaxing hobby.
meanings.sent4: His leadership skills greatly improved the manageability of the company.
meanings.sent5: The manageability of the schedule made it easy to follow.
